remarks: A sequence of transpositions describes a finitary permutation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
statement:
psgnval.g $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` D ) $.
psgnval.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) $.
psgnval.n $e |- N = ( pmSgn ` D ) $.
psgneldm2i $p |- ( ( D e. V /\ W e. Word T ) -> ( G gsum W ) e. dom N ) $.
